q1.question: I already have a basic website, what would Aera add?
q1.answer: Aera boosts your digital presence by offering a more agile and modern experience for your clients: • Online payments, optimized to reduce friction and increase conversions. • Flight self-management, with a history of flights taken, booked, and requested. • Automatic email notifications, improving communication at every stage. For your internal operation, Aera allows you to: • Publish Empty Legs, accompanied by personalized email marketing campaigns. • Manage your fleet, clients, and pilots from a single centralized panel. • Scale without limits, as Aera grows with your business.

q2.question: I don't have a website
q2.answer: We take care of implementing and fully customizing Aera for your business, without the need for you to have a previous website.

q3.question: I don't have a domain
q3.answer: We take care of managing both the domain and hosting of your website, providing you with a comprehensive solution.

q4.question: I want a commercial email
q4.answer: We provide you with a commercial email box with your domain to strengthen the professional image of your brand.
